timeline.bodyText:
I personally really hate the weightsum attribute. You can omit it if you have specified the weight of every child view, using weightsum should be to change the default behaviour of not specifying the weight of a view, which is a bad practice anyway, just specify the weight of every child if you are positioning them proportionately.
This is of course all legacy knowledge, best practice is use constraintlayout everywhere* and probably in a years time use Compose everywhere.
